org.platanios.learn.classification

Class LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.classification.LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - This type corresponds to the type of the final object to be built. That is, the super class of the builder class that extends this class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression.AbstractBuilder, LogisticRegressionPrediction.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    LogisticRegressionPrediction

    protected abstract static class LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class needs to be extended by the builders of all binary logistic regression classes. It provides an implementation for those parts of those builders that are common. This is basically part of a small "hack" so that we can have inheritable builder classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int numberOfFeatures
      The number of features used.
      private boolean sparse
      Indicates whether sparse vectors should be used or not.
      protected Vector weights
      The weights (i.e., parameters) used by this logistic regression model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractBuilder() 
      protected AbstractBuilder(java.io.ObjectInputStream inputStream)
      Constructs a builder object for a binary logistic regression model and loads the model parameters (i.e., the weight vectors from the provided input stream.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractBuilder

        protected AbstractBuilder()

      • AbstractBuilder

        protected AbstractBuilder(java.io.ObjectInputStream inputStream)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a builder object for a binary logistic regression model and loads the model parameters (i.e., the weight vectors from the provided input stream. This constructor should be used if the logistic regression model that is being built is going to be used for making predictions alone (i.e., no training is supported).
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input stream from which to read the model parameters from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • self

        protected abstract T self()
        A self-reference to this builder class. This is basically part of a small "hack" so that we can have inheritable builder classes.

      • sparse

        public T sparse(boolean sparse)
        Sets the sparse field that indicates whether sparse vectors should be used.
        Parameters:
        sparse - The value to which to set the sparse field.
        Returns:
        This builder object itself. That is done so that we can use a nice and expressive code format when we build objects using this builder class.

      • build

        public LogisticRegressionPrediction build()
